abstract: Disney’s friendly deal to buy Marvel Entertainment makes it easy to forget that the comic-book company’s takeover history has a dark side: In the late 1990s, Ronald O. Perelman was grappling with Carl C. Icahn for control of Marvel.
snippet: Disney’s friendly deal to buy Marvel Entertainment makes it easy to forget that the comic-book company’s takeover history has a dark side: In the late 1990s, Ronald O. Perelman was grappling with Carl C. Icahn for control of Marvel.
lead_paragraph: As Walt Disney announced its friendly, $4 billion deal to buy Marvel Entertainment on Monday, complete with upbeat quotes from top executives, it was easy to forget that the comic book company’s deal-making history has a dark side.
